Everyday, you will spend hours outside of mandatory live class studying, designing or building. While the schedule is flexible, you must invest about 20 hours a week including:

  • Live classes
  • Fireside chats with industry experts and mentors
  • Live Q&As with experienced designers
  • Monthly Sprint Challenges
  • Access to facilitators and mentors.

    [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_code _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#FFFFFF” custom_padding=”20px|20px|20px|20px|true|true” border_radii=”on|15px|15px|15px|15px” box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”20px” box_shadow_spread=”-80px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]If you have already registered on this site before, please login to complete your assessment & access your account.Price: $10
